name: As3DoodleJump
body:
### As3DoodleJump
It's a simple version: no powerups, no enemys, no sounds, and the blue stick is tricky.
You can learn some basic gaming logic from this project.

### control:
	Left/Right-Move
	R-Restart

### try
<object id="gameobj" codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=5,0,0,0" width="100%" height="480">

</object>
